Row.Text: "He who fights with monsters should look that he himself does not become a monster. And when you gaze long into an abyss the abyss also gazes into you."
"Who overcomes by force, hath overcome but half his foe."
"In peace sons bury fathers, but in war fathers bury sons."

"'My name is Ozymandias, king of kings:[NEWLINE]Look on my works, ye Mighty, and despair!'[NEWLINE] Nothing beside remains. Round the decay[NEWLINE]Of that colossal wreck, boundless and bare[NEWLINE]The lone and level sands stretch far away."
"If you're in favor of freedom of speech, that means you're in favor of freedom of speech precisely for views you despise."
"They feel no terror at not loving or at not being loved; So many many many of my fellow creatures."
Burning in Water, Drowning in Flame
